spec.name: El Gharb Market
spec.description: El Gharb Market (March√© El Gharb) is a local traditional market or souk, named after the area (Gharb meaning 'West'). It serves the surrounding neighborhood, providing a wide array of goods, including fresh produce, household items, and clothing. Markets like this are integral to the daily life of Casablanca's working-class and residential districts, functioning as bustling centers of commerce and social interaction.
